title: Universal newsreel
brief_description: Newsreel items: 1. Hilda blows out - hurricane leaves heavy destruction Franklin, Louisana. 2. “Thresher” found - undersea cameras pinpoint submarine - atomic sub found in Atlantic, east of Boston. 3. News in brief - California: new high speed plane makes debut from Edwards Air Force base. 4. Sports - Ohio: Davis Cup. Chuck McKinely v Roy Emerson. Emerson wins.
